comments:
When attempting to open manual test testsuites that contain references to other
testsuites I get the following exception. This seems similar to bug # 81225 but
does not only occur in the CVS perspective. I do not get this when opening leaf
testsuites.

I'm testing against build TPTP-4.0-200505210100A. The stack trace is:

Upgrading to critical. This should be fixed in 4.0 i4.

Hi George,

Is there a manual test in CVS that I can use to reproduce this?  I tried 
making this happen on the latest bits in a runtime workspace, and also using 
the latest build (TPTP-4.0.0-200506131503), and I can open manual tests thaty 
have references to other manual tests fine.  As an example, from CVS, test-
results/platform/org.eclipse.hyades.use.cases/manual/AllTests.testsuite

Closing as WORKSFORME.  If you still see a problem, please attach examples of 
the offending tests.

Thanks,
--Joe
